word_mean: 闭塞，闭合，封闭，阻塞，隔断
封存：将一种物质，液体或气体，密封于一种固体的空腔内

环境光遮蔽（ambient occlusion）(Ambient Occlusion)：超高、高、普通、低和关闭。超高和高档都是DX11专属，很消耗资源。
4、增加对环境光吸收(Ambient Occlusion)的支持，可在驱动控制面板中启用。该技术可为游戏带来增强的3D真实感。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin occlus- 'shut up' (from the verb occludere) + -ion

means.word_mean: 1. closure or blockage (as of a blood vessel)
2. (meteorology) a composite front when colder air surrounds a mass of warm air and forces it aloft
3. (dentistry) the normal spatial relation of the teeth when the jaws are closed
4. an obstruction in a pipe or tube;

sentences.sentence: "we had to call a plumber to clear out the blockage in the drainpipe"

stems_affixes.word_buile: conclude[[v.结论;终结]]男→adj.决定性的;结论性的
exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→adj.排外的, 孤高的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→n.排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
occlude[[v.闭塞,堵塞]]男稳荽省鷑.闭塞,堵塞
preclude[[v.妨碍;阻止]]→n.排除, 阻止
con全部+clud关闭+e→全部关掉→结束
oc一再+clude=clud关闭→一再关起来不畅通→堵塞
pre预先,提前+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
se分开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的
